summary: Silverlight for BodySlide++ Normal - BBP - TBBP
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1025.photobucket.com/albums/y312/nschleicher/Silverlogo_zps451ae7ee.png[/IMG]

This mod is for Bodyslider only you still need the original mods to be able to craft or use the armor
Both of thees files are Accentual for it to work
SilverLight - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10251/?
BodySlider - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?

Silverlight (Norm no physics)
Silverlight BBP (Brest Bounce Physics)
Silverlight TBBP (True Breast Bounce + But physics)

Plz Credit Jojjo of Silverlight for his dedication to this nice Armor & me if you like my work
& also cotyounoyume for LSAR undergarments used on the new set

Update 1.1
---------------

Non-solvable current clipping (due to animation):
--------------------------------------------------------------------

The Loincloths will clip through the body when using Feminine Walk Animation
The Cuirass top belt will clip at the back with Breathing idle Animation

To reduce clipping try to keep your body proportions reasonably normal.
OTT does not work well with this armour. If the proportions are too extreme
clipping will occur but you have Zap function to remove badly clipping parts
if you need to.

Folder Data/CalienteTools/BodySlide/ShapeData/Silverline/Option Black panty+Bra
There you have 3 Silverlightxxx.nif files that you can copy into the folder
Data/CalienteTools/BodySlide/ShapeData/Silverline to make the panty+Bra Black
if you using the black textures Set

Update 1.2
---------------

Rebuilt all weights and setup Armour not to clip into the body.

- LegStraps Solved
- Bra Sraps Solved
- Silk Solved

Added Chainmail with Zap function, not the cheap way round using the body skin
but by adding a totally new surface for it. This should be the final version, so
i hope you will enjoy it as much as i do and thanks for the help.

Update 1.3
----------

- CDT on normal body no animation solved
- Cliping on Chainmail removed
- Slider presets updated for BodyStudio 2.0
- Added 2 more zap sliders

My other files are
Cubic Hair 3D for BodySlide++ http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49711/?
author: EliteCheat
